name: Banshee

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in the Arena by 52%.

skills.name: Grave Chill
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 20% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Cursed Touch
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of removing 1 random buff from each target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Death Ray
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 2 times at random. Each attack has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
